titleStmt.title: The pursuit of the historie of Lazarillo de Tormez Gathered out of the ancient chronicles of Toledo. By Iean de luna, a Castilian. And now done into English, and set forth by the same author.
Segunda parte de La vida de Lazarillo de Tormes. English
titleStmt.author: Luna, Juan de, b. ca. 1585.
Walkley, Thomas, d. 1658?

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Bernard Alsop for Thomas Walkley and are to be sold at his shop at the Eagle and Child in Britaines Burse,

notesStmt.note: A translation, by Thomas Walkley, of: Luna, Juan de. La segunda parte de La vida de Lazarillo de Tormes.
A sequel to: La vida de Lazarillo de Tormes.
A different text from "The most pleasant and delectable history of Lazarillo de Tormes. The second part" (STC 15340).
Reproduction of the original in the Folger Shakespeare Library.
